argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_0hmop | |- 0hop e. HrmOp |
| 2 |  | #P_idhmop | |- Iop e. HrmOp |
| 3 |  | #P_leop2 | |- ( ( 0hop e. HrmOp /\ Iop e. HrmOp ) -> ( 0hop <_op Iop <-> A. x e. ~H ( ( 0hop ` x ) .ih x ) <_ ( ( Iop ` x ) .ih x ) ) ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_mp2an | |- ( 0hop <_op Iop <-> A. x e. ~H ( ( 0hop ` x ) .ih x ) <_ ( ( Iop ` x ) .ih x ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_hiidge0 | |- ( x e. ~H -> 0 <_ ( x .ih x ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_ho0val | |- ( x e. ~H -> ( 0hop ` x ) = 0h ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( x e. ~H -> ( ( 0hop ` x ) .ih x ) = ( 0h .ih x ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_hi01 | |- ( x e. ~H -> ( 0h .ih x ) = 0 ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( x e. ~H -> ( ( 0hop ` x ) .ih x ) = 0 ) |
| 10 |  | #P_hoival | |- ( x e. ~H -> ( Iop ` x ) = x ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( x e. ~H -> ( ( Iop ` x ) .ih x ) = ( x .ih x ) ) |
| 12 | 5, 9, 11 | #P_3brtr4d | |- ( x e. ~H -> ( ( 0hop ` x ) .ih x ) <_ ( ( Iop ` x ) .ih x ) ) |
| 13 | 4, 12 | #P_mprgbir | |- 0hop <_op Iop |
